"Laguna Beach, California. Ben (Aaron Johnson) and Chon (Taylor Kitsch) are great friends, share the same girlfriend, Ophelia (Blake Lively), and took care of his own business of planting and distribution of marijuana. Life's trio follows in full swing until the emergence of a dangerous Mexican drug cartel that society offers them. As Ben and Chon did not accept the proposal, Ophelia is kidnapped. The rescue is equivalent to all the money they won in the last five years. Friends willing to pay the amount, but prepare an alternative plan so they can stay with Ophelia and money, and it relies on the help of Dennis (John Travolta), a rogue agent of the Anti-Drug Division.
